Sentence: About a year after they are married, Clara and Esteban's first child, Blanca, is born
Blanca and Pedro Tercero's love grows as they mature, and they soon realize that Esteban would disapprove if he (Esteban) knew
Esteban makes Blanca leave Tres Marias and tries to kill Pedro Tercero
Esteban tells her (Blanca) that he (Esteban) has killed Pedro Tercero and forces her (Blanca) to marry Jean de Satigny
At Blanca's request, Pedro Tercero intervenes and saves Esteban
He (Esteban) is powerless to do much other than to help Blanca and Pedro Tercero escape to Canada
